instruction:
1) Get the KM3-to-EMF configuration.
2) Apply the Mantis-to-XML transformation to /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/SoftwareQualityControl2MantisBTFile/modelsExamples/MantisExample.xmi with the configuration from step 1.

1. Get the configuration for the KM3-to-DSL transformation.
2. Apply the configuration to the KM3 model at /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/DSLBridge/MetamodelBridge/Models/SimpleExample/DSL2EMF/SimpleExampleMM-KM3.xmi for the KM3-to-DSL transformation.

Get the configuration settings of the XML-to-Ant model transformation, then apply the XML-to-XSLT transformation with the path '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/XSLT2XQuery/XML/tr.xsl-XML.xmi' using the output of Step 1 as context.

1) Get the configuration of the Families-to-Persons transformation.
2) Apply the KM3-to-DSL transformation to the KM3 model at the path '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/DSLBridge/MetamodelBridge/Models/SimpleExample/DSL2EMF/SimpleExampleMM-KM3.xmi' according to the first step result.

Step 1: Get the configuration settings for the transformation from XML model to Ant DSL, focusing on the source XML metamodel, target Ant DSL metamodel, and mapping rules.

Step 2: Apply the KM3-to-DSL transformation to the KM3 model at the path '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/DSLBridge/MetamodelBridge/Models/SimpleExample/DSL2EMF/SimpleExampleMM-KM3.xmi' per the configuration retrieved in step 1, resulting in a DSL model.

Get the Families-to-Persons transformation configuration between Families and Persons models.
Apply the retrieved configuration to the file at /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Ant2Maven/example/build1.xmi for the XML-to-Ant transformation between XML and Ant models.

parameters.commit_message: Applied Families->Persons-derived XML-to-Ant config to build1.xmi

instruction:
1) get the configuration of the transformation from Families model to Persons model
2) apply the configuration from the first step to the XML output from the Families-to-Persons transformation via the path '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/XSLT2XQuery/XML/tr.xsl-XML.xmi' to XSLT

- Get the configuration of the Ant-to-Maven transformation.
- Apply the Grafcet-to-PetriNet transformation to the file at /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Grafcet2PetriNet/Models/example.xmi with the configuration from step 1.

- Get the configuration of the Ant-to-Maven transformation (Ant metamodel to Maven metamodel).
- Apply the SimpleClass-to-SimpleRDBMS transformation to /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/SimpleClass2SimpleRDBMS/Sample-SimpleClass.xmi, with the step-1 configuration for mapping and parameters.

Step 1: Get configuration for the MySQL-to-KM3 mapping, including input MySQL model type and output KM3 model type.

Step 2: Apply the SimpleClass-to-SimpleRDBMS transformation to the SimpleClass model file at /Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/SimpleClass2SimpleRDBMS/Sample-SimpleClass.xmi with KM3 output from Step 1.

- Get the configuration settings of the PNML-to-XML transformation (PNML model to XML model).
- Apply the Ant-to-Maven transformation to the Ant model at '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Ant2Maven/example/build1Ant.xmi'.

1) Get the configuration settings of the Mantis-to-XML transformation for the next step
2) Apply the Families-to-Persons transformation to the Families model at path '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/Families2Persons/sample-Families.xmi'

1) Get configuration of the transformation from SimpleClass to SimpleRDBMS.
2) Apply the Mantis-to-XML transformation to the file at '/Users/zakariahachm/Downloads/atl_zoo/SoftwareQualityControl2MantisBTFile/modelsExamples/MantisExample.xmi', with the configuration from Step 1.

parameters.notes: Transformation completed and XML validated against the Mantis schema.

instruction:

instruction:
